name: Retro Trivia Quest (Demo)
description:
RETRO TRIVIA QUEST (demo)

Jeopardy! meets Dragon Quest in this unique Game Boy adventure.

CONTROLS GAME BOY
KEYBOARD (LEFTY)KEYBOARD (RIGHTY)D-PadWASDArrow Keys
A ButtonKX
B ButtonJZ
Select
SHIFTSHIFTStart
ENTERENTER FEATURES
  • Unique trivia battle system
  • 2 gameplay types: interactive story & action
  • Collect video games and consoles
  • Detailed pixel art characters
  • Runs on real Game Boy hardware
PC, MOBILE, AND REAL HARDWARE

Along with web browsers, smart phones, and emulators, Retro Trivia Quest runs on real Game Boy hardware! Copy the rom to your favourite flash cart, and away you go.

FIRST GAME EVER

This demo is the first video game I’ve ever released! Despite its short length, it was a long journey just to get here. I have tons of respect for anyone who finishes a game -no matter how big or small.

FEEDBACK

Feel free to share your constructive comments before I continue with the full game.

  • Was it too hard?
  • Too easy?
  • Did you make it to the end?
  • Find any bugs?
